item.title: Tech talks
item.description: The tech conferences I spoke on: 2019 “Android Summit” “GDG DevFest” “Droidcon SF”

item.title: How not to abuse extensions in Kotlin
item.description: Kotlin extensions are very practical. They help to reduce the boilerplate of the code. Code highlight example: fun <T> Context.getComponent(clazz: Class<T>): T { return this.applicationContext.getSystemService(clazz.name) as T } Gist: Tweet: I'm in love with `SpannableStringBuilder` extensions. Did not know it's been out since 2017! #android #androidDev pic.twitter.com/sgGskizj4j — Aida (@Aida_Isay) September 14, 2019 Practice, practice, practice The End!

item.title: About me
item.description: Android developer with a full-time job at a company that pays me salary. Sometimes I come out of the comfort zone and give tech talks, and when I'm not lazy I write blog posts on this website.
